text: Electronic music is music made with electronics. Electronic music may also refer to: *Electronic dance music, electronic dance and pop music such as drum and bass, trance and techno *Electronica, Electrosion-genre popular music, usually groove-based *Electronic musical instrument, is a musical instrument that produces its sounds using electronics. *Electronic (band) == See also == *List of electronic music genres *Electronic rock (disambiguation)
title: Electronic music (disambiguation)
